title: #23: The State-Sponsored Fear Industry
description:
Decision making from a place of fear is never a good idea, but it happens every single day. The people that are running this world count on keeping humanity mired in a sea of fear, uncertainty, and dread so that they are preoccupied with danger and unable to focus on the real problems that their government is creating.

The government uses its favorite tool, the mainstream media, to fan the flames of fear and hatred towards other religions, races, nationalities, and ways of thinking in order to distract the public away from the horrible things they are actually doing.

It is obvious that fear sells; the question is why are you buying it?
